concept.title: Using Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) (Tech Preview)
concept.shortdesc: Eucalyptus Virtual Private Cloud (VPC) allows you to define a logically isolated virtual network that can contain Eucalyptus resources. A virtual network enhances security by allowing you to have fine-grained, explicit control over routing tables, network gateways, subnets, IP address ranges, and inbound and outbound connectivity. This section of the User Guide covers how Eucalyptus VPC works and how to use it.
